channel.title: qubes-whonix thunderbird @danwin1210.de
channel.description:
Good evening, after following the whonix guide I'm unable to get thunderbird working with my danwin1210 email address; [guide name]Encrypted_Email_with_Thunderbird [guide name]
Please can someone advise if this guide is still up to date?
I am able to receive email, however when attempting to send mail I get an error message; Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: <>: Sender address rejected: Access denied. Please check the message recipient "" and try again
If anyone has any idea what the problem could be please can you give me a shout?
Thanks
:)

item.title: qubes-whonix thunderbird @danwin1210.de
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Needs to be resolved as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle since its unlikely that Whonix does something specifically to break certain e-mail providers.

Read full topic
